articles.description: Nottingham Forest receive an immediate four-point deduction for breaching Premier League profit and sustainability rules.
articles.title: Forest docked four points for financial rules breach

articles.description: Dame Laura Kenny, Britain's most successful female Olympian, announces her retirement from cycling.
articles.title: Laura Kenny: Britain's most successful female Olympian retires from cycling

articles.description: Find out the in depth batting and bowling figures for Multan Sultans v Islamabad United in the Pakistan Super League on BBC Sport.
articles.title: Multan Sultans v Islamabad United - Cricket - BBC Sport

articles.description: Danish reporter Niels Christian Frederiksen insists he has "absolutely no problem" after facing an outburst from Jurgen Klopp following Liverpool's FA Cup loss at Manchester United.
articles.title: 'No problem' - Danish reporter unfazed by Klopp outburst

articles.description: John Barclay and Sam Warburton pick different fly-halves in their teams of the tournament. Who do they pick?
articles.title: Garbisi or Ford? Six Nations team of the tournament

articles.description: Born in Nigeria. Bred in Glasgow. Bound for the NFL? Praise Olatoke has swapped the running track for the gridiron field as he looks to fly the flag for Scotland stateside.
articles.title: NFL: Praise Olatoke aiming for American football stardom

articles.description: Players Championship winner Scottie Scheffler may be miles away from the longevity of Tiger Woods' dominance but they can be mentioned in same breath, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: Tiger Woods comparisons 'inevitable' for Scottie Scheffler after Players Championship win

articles.description: Dame Laura Kenny, Britain's most successful female Olympian, tells BBC Breakfast "it is the right decision" to retire from cycling.
articles.title: It is the right decision to retire - Kenny

articles.description: Caragh McMurtry spent five years taking debilitating medication for a condition she didn't have. Now, the former Great Britain rower is fighting to ensure no-one has to suffer in the same way.
articles.title: Caragh McMurtry: Great Britain rower's neurodiversity journey

articles.description: Kyrie Irving hits a one-handed buzzer-beater from 20ft to lead the Dallas Mavericks to a 107-105 win over the Denver Nuggets.
articles.title: NBA: Kyrie Irving claims dramatic win for Dallas Mavericks over Denver Nuggets
